text: Hello everyone. I would like to ask something. If you had data information about what your contact could buy from you in excel spreadsheet or an external data base. How would you add the information to HubSpot to create email marketing target campaigns? Example I could have over 1k different items associated with a unique contact.
I thought about using the  <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/analytics/events|CBE API> to store that in a event, but not sure if this a great option or if it is possible.
hey ana! interesting use case for the CBE api--we actually have a beta running where you can import event completions via a spreadsheet--seems perfect for this use case
would love for you to try it out
(im the PM for CBEs at HubSpot)
